    • Outside lights left on ‚Äì All night. Sorry, neighbours.

    • Awning chaos ‚Äì Set it up in wind. Took it down in rain. Regret both.
    • Dog escape artist ‚Äì Forgot to zip the awning. Cue the chase.

    ‚úÖ Successes Worth Repeating

    • Arrival checklist ‚Äì Saved us from forgetting chocks, keys, or switching the fridge.
    • Pitch-friendly layout ‚Äì Door facing the view, awning catching the breeze.
    • Meal prep magic ‚Äì Pre-chopped veg and frozen sauces = campsite gourmet.
    • Neighbourly vibes ‚Äì A wave, a chat, and a borrowed mallet go a long way.
    • Dog-friendly routines ‚Äì Lead hooks, paw wipes, and shaded spots for snoozing.
    • Weather-wise packing ‚Äì Layers, waterproofs, and a backup plan for every forecast.
    • Site reviews ‚Äì Left honest feedback to help the next traveller (and future us).
